channel.title: Comments on: Google Now Translates To Hebrew
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: Yep, Google is an OK big-bad-wolf company :) They also have the correction feature where you can offer your own translated version of sentences translated by the system. It's a nice touch.
item.content:encoded:
Yep, Google is an OK big-bad-wolf company :)
They also have the correction feature where you can offer your own translated version of sentences translated by the system. It’s a nice touch.

item.title: By: udim
item.dc:creator: udim
item.description:
The cool thing is that they feed the system translated and original versions of documents to learn from.
http://googlesystem.blogspot.com/2008/09/more-languages- in-google-translate.html
item.content:encoded:
The cool thing is that they feed the system translated and original versions of documents to learn from.

http://googlesystem.blogspot.com/2008/09/more-languages-
in-google-translate.html
